ud5.3:4.5: anupubbiṃ kathaṃ → ānupubbīkathaṃ (bj); anupubbīkathaṃ (si); anupubbikathaṃ (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1, mr)
ud5.3:4.8: nekkhamme → nekkhamme ca (bj, sya-all); nikkhame ca (pts-vp-pli1)
ud5.3:7.2: acirapakkantaṃ suppabuddhaṃ kuṭṭhiṃ → atha kho suppabuddhaṃ kuṭṭhiṃ acirapakkantaṃ (bj); atha kho suppabuddhaṃ acirapakkantaṃ (si); atha kho suppabuddhaṃ (pts-vp-pli1)
